attributes.title: Absolutely Horrifying
attributes.review: I downloaded this app at what had started as a good morning. It’s been an hour and my phone will not stop glitching. My contacts have somehow been leaked and I’m receiving nonstop spam callers; I’m talking every couple minutes. I’ve gotten texts and have been harassed. People have threatened to drag me across the sand and dump me in the ocean etc. This app MUST GO. It has no good within it ESPECIALLY SINCE IT’S ABOUT TRUMP.

attributes.title: very ugly 🧚🏻💕✨
attributes.review: downloaded to try and vary my sources of information regarding the 2020 election. but instead was met with a barrage of useless garbage sent via text and email. the interface is badly designed, the imagery and verbiage is misleading and propagandistic. the app encourages irresponsible behaviors like hosting “MAGA meetups” during a global pandemic, where we should be exercising caution and practicing social distancing.  they keep trying to sell me some ugly hats as well.

attributes.title: never again! upset and dissatisfaction 😡😾😾
attributes.review: DO NOT under any circumstance get this so-called “app”!! 2 hours after i downloaded it i got a terrible virus on my mobile telling me i was stanky fishy, stanky fishy! and the paranormal activity tht this app summons IS 100% REAL! it somehow conjured the ghost of george washington into my house whispering in my ear that “donald trump is keeping barron trump in his basement with minimal resources”. expected more from the 74 year old bat😪

attributes.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE
attributes.review: As one of few gen z supporters of trump i was ECSTATIC to find an app that lets me support my favorite president that loves all equally. an app is perfect to cater to his VERY YOUNG audience and most of us youngens just really love him. however this app is obviously designed by a cheeto and just overall horrible wouldn’t recommend. need blueprints of the whitehouse for no reason in particular that pertains to barron at all. anyways don’t download not helpful

attributes.title: THIS APP RUNIED MY LIFE😭😭😭😭😭
attributes.review: i literally love my president so much but this is just awful.....i had to put in my phone number and the app kept texting me and i was so happy bc i could learn ways to support my hero!😄 (Trump obvi) ((that gorgeous man)) but my boyfriend thought i was cheating on him and broke up w me😭😭😭😭😭😭😭 i cry. Now i hate this app👿👿👿👿 the app is now blowing up my phone and over loaded the system. Now my phone is broke and my bf left me.....AND IM PREGNANT😭😭😭😭

attributes.title: I HAVE NIGHTMARES!!!!!
attributes.review: So I was looking at the pictures of the app and when I went to go download it I started turning orange. I have to wake up everyday thinking that I look like a ✨Cheeto puff✨. I left my phone right next to my hamster cage and when he look over to see my phone he died because he got so traumatized. I feel so bad that my hamster had to witness such a bad looking ✨Cheeto✨rip Bobby😔. 🧚🏼😊✨Trump 2020 but on a grave stone😊✨🧚🏼

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻nasty🧚🏻✨
attributes.review: i have never been so disappointed in my life. the fact that this is still on the app store makes me 🤮. i downloaded this so i could watch trump as he spray tans, but soon after i noticed some weird dreams. for the first time in my life i have had dreams at night when i sleep. when i close my eyes all i can hear is his voice telling me i smell like cheese 🧀 (and that hurt because i am vegan) now i have to see many doctors because i cannot sleep for the fear of donald insulting my smell. if you are concierto g getting this app i do not recommend. it is haunted. if you want that might as well bust out the old ouija board and contact the demons.😖😖

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: It was just a normal day and when I went outside to check on my cat I noticed that it was not there so I looked in the backyard and I found my cat dead 💀😪😿 ever since I downloaded this app my was killed 😖I was just trying to see our orange president😼but the only thing that happened was that my cat was killed and my other cat was microwaved please don’t download this app it will kill you cats 🐱😿💔😪

attributes.title: Your trash
attributes.review: When I opened the app all the stuff he had done with little kids popped up on my phone😬and then my phone got a virus bc that’s how bad of a president you are🙄who ever said you changed the world must be blind bc sis nothing has change😗🤦‍♀️I’m just waiting for the simpsons to predict something right again bc I’ve been waiting😭😭I also feel bad for your family

attributes.title: its a no for me👁👃🏼👁
attributes.review: so i was just going through the app u know it was all good then all of a sudden my gold fish died as soon as i opened the app i had read in a previous review that the app was curses but i didn't believe it at first until strange scary and unusual things keept happening but only when i opened the app like i said first my goldfish bob died then i started getting spammed in my email my random people claiming if i dont support trump in his campaign they'll spam all mu socials with fairy comments and even tho i said i would which was a lie now that everything has happened with this app they actually did it and they were just so mean i-😢
